about_the_game:
Shine for real with the Luminous Pack! Here you will find something that will not only make your character brighter than everyone else, but will also greatly help in the conquest of Erikuria.

Luminous Judge Mask
The majestic decoration of the times of empires. Can be upgraded by assigning 1 to 3 random stats with the Cube of Fortune and then changing their values ​​with the Cube of the Nameless.
Luminous's Judge's Standard
Shoulder decoration. Can be upgraded with a magic pen.
Summon Luminous
When used, summons a luminous steed from the sky, increasing movement speed by 150% and maximum health by 20%.
Spirit of Justice Pet
Pet bonuses:
10 - Exceptional Stamina (Increases wearer's stamina by 1.6%.) OR Exceptional Spirit (Increases wearer's spirit by 1.6%)
20 - Powerful Rune Protection (Reduces magical damage taken by the wearer by 7.5%.) OR Superior Defensive Stance (Reduces physical damage taken by the wearer by 7.5%.)
30 - Exceptional Stamina (Increases wearer's stamina by 1.6%.) OR Exceptional Spirit (Increases wearer's spirit by 1.6%)
40 - Superior Vigilance (Reduces chance to get a critical hit by 6.5%) OR Thorns (5% chance to reflect 30% of the damage taken by the wearer. The chance to reflect increases by 5% every 10s, up to 50% until the reflection is triggered.)
50 - Exceptional Stamina (Increases wearer's stamina by 1.6%.) OR Exceptional Spirit (Increases wearer's spirit by 1.6%)
60 - Greater Fortitude (Reduces incoming damage by 15% for 10s if the wearer is CCed. Cannot trigger more than once every 40s.) OR Greater Wound Healing (Recovers 85% of the wearer's normal health regen during combat.)[ /i]
Bright Fox Loot Collector (eternal)
Summons a tamed animal to help the owner collect items. Helper run speed increased by 30%.
Fortune Cube
Assigns 1 to 3 random stats to Eternal Ornamental Headpieces. The maximum and minimum possible value of the assigned attribute depends on the character's current level.
Powerful Magic Pen
Allows you to get a random rare or very rare pattern (gain). Applied to a back attachment and removes its temporary restrictions.

Buying this set, you get items at a big discount!

Shine for real with the Luminous Pack! Here you will find something that will not only make your character brighter than everyone else, but will also greatly help in the conquest of Erikuria.

Luminous Judge Mask
The majestic decoration of the times of empires. Can be upgraded by assigning 1 to 3 random stats with the Cube of Fortune and then changing their values ​​with the Cube of the Nameless.
Luminous's Judge's Standard

When used, summons a luminous steed from the sky, increasing movement speed by 150% and maximum health by 20%.
Spirit of Justice Pet

10 - Exceptional Stamina (Increases wearer's stamina by 1.6%.) OR Exceptional Spirit (Increases wearer's spirit by 1.6%)
20 - Powerful Rune Protection (Reduces magical damage taken by the wearer by 7.5%.) OR Superior Defensive Stance (Reduces physical damage taken by the wearer by 7.5%.)
30 - Exceptional Stamina (Increases wearer's stamina by 1.6%.) OR Exceptional Spirit (Increases wearer's spirit by 1.6%)
40 - Superior Vigilance (Reduces chance to get a critical hit by 6.5%) OR Thorns (5% chance to reflect 30% of the damage taken by the wearer. The chance to reflect increases by 5% every 10s, up to 50% until the reflection is triggered.)
50 - Exceptional Stamina (Increases wearer's stamina by 1.6%.) OR Exceptional Spirit (Increases wearer's spirit by 1.6%)
60 - Greater Fortitude (Reduces incoming damage by 15% for 10s if the wearer is CCed. Cannot trigger more than once every 40s.) OR Greater Wound Healing (Recovers 85% of the wearer's normal health regen during combat.)[ /i]
Bright Fox Loot Collector (eternal)
Summons a tamed animal to help the owner collect items. Helper run speed increased by 30%.
Fortune Cube
Assigns 1 to 3 random stats to Eternal Ornamental Headpieces. The maximum and minimum possible value of the assigned attribute depends on the character's current level.
Powerful Magic Pen
Allows you to get a random rare or very rare pattern (gain). Applied to a back attachment and removes its temporary restrictions.

Buying this set, you get items at a big discount!
name: Sphere 3 - Luminous

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Dual core more than 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader 3.0 support Geforce 6600, Radeon X1600, 256 Mb RAM and DirectX 9.0c support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX support
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 (32 or 64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core more than 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader 3.0 support Geforce 8800, Radeon HD4000, 512 Mb RAM and DirectX 9.0c support
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX support

short_description: Shine for real with the Lightbringer Pack! Here you will find something that will not only make your character brighter than everyone else, but will also greatly help in the conquest of Erikuria.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, French, Italian, German, Polish, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
